tool_description: The Anime Jokes API provides access to a collection of jokes related to anime.
title: Anime Jokes

api_list.name: Search jokes by anime name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-jokes.p.rapidapi.com/animes/?anime=one%20piece"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-jokes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get jokes using page
api_list.description: Enter the page number to get the jokes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-jokes.p.rapidapi.com/jokes/?page=1"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-jokes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get anime by ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-jokes.p.rapidapi.com/animes/{id}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-jokes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all jokes
